data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a Dinamo Moscow throw-in in Sochi's half.
In the minute 2, Can Dinamo Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sochi's half?
Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
In Sochi Sochi's Marko Dugandzic is caught offside.
In the minute 6, Dinamo Moscow's Vyacheslav Grulev is whistled for offside at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
In Sochi a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Sochi in the half of Dinamo Moscow.
In the minute 11, Vitaly Meshkov awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Sochi close to the penalty box.
In the minute 13, Dinamo Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Dinamo Moscow to take a throw-in in Sochi territory.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Sochi in their own half.
In the minute 16, Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Sochi just outside Dinamo Moscow's area.
Roman Evgeniev (Dinamo Moscow) gets a yellow card. He will be suspended from the next match!
Sochi drives forward and Joaozinho gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 17, Sochi have been awarded a corner by Vitaly Meshkov.
Ball goes out of play for a Dinamo Moscow goal kick.
Christian Noboa (Sochi) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow.
Free kick Dinamo Moscow.
In the minute 21, Dinamo Moscow's Sebastian Szymanski is on target but unsuccessful.
Dinamo Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Sochi in their own half.
In the minute 24, Corner awarded to Sochi.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Can Dinamo Moscow capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sochi's half?
In the minute 26, Clinton N'Jie of Dinamo Moscow smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Dinamo Moscow have been awarded a corner by Vitaly Meshkov.
Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
In the minute 28, Throw-in Dinamo Moscow.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in the half of Sochi.
Dinamo Moscow are coming forward and Guillermo Varela gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 29, Vitaly Meshkov awards Sochi a goal kick.
Sochi's Christian Noboa gets in a shot on goal at Fisht Olympic Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Can Sochi get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half?
In the minute 32, Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
In Sochi Dinamo Moscow drive forward through Clinton N'Jie. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 34, Ball safe as Sochi is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Sochi.
Sergey Terekhov gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sochi.
In the minute 36, Dinamo Moscow have been awarded a corner by Vitaly Meshkov.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick in a good position for Sochi!
In the minute 39, Throw-in Dinamo Moscow.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Christian Noboa for Sochi drives towards goal at Fisht Olympic Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 43, Sochi have been awarded a corner by Vitaly Meshkov.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a throw-in for Sochi, close to Dinamo Moscow's area.
Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 44, Marko Dugandzic (Sochi) gets a yellow card.
Daniil Lesovoy (Dinamo Moscow) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Dinamo Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sochi have a dangerous throw-in.
Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Christian Noboa of Sochi is pulled up for offside.
In Sochi Dinamo Moscow attack through Vyacheslav Grulev. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Sochi at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
Vitaly Meshkov has blown to start the second-half.
Anton Zabolotnyi is replacing Marko Dugandzic for the home team.
In the minute 47, Corner awarded to Sochi.
Corner awarded to Sochi.
Sochi push upfield and Ivan Miladinovic gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Dinamo Moscow defence.
In the minute 48, Vitaly Meshkov signals a Sochi throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half.
Dinamo Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Sochi in their own half.
In the minute 51, Important block from the Dinamo Moscow defence as Artur Yusupov fires in a strike for Sochi.
Sochi pushes forward through Joaozinho, whose finish on goal is saved.
Artur Yusupov for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 52, Dinamo Moscow have a goal kick.
Sochi take a 1-0 lead thanks to Anton Zabolotnyi.
Joaozinho instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 54, Vitaly Meshkov awards the home team a throw-in.
Sylvester Igboun is on a sub for Vyacheslav Grulev for Dinamo Moscow.
Vitaly Meshkov awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 56, Vitaly Meshkov blows against Dinamo Moscow's Sylvester Igboun for offside.
Dinamo Moscow to take a throw-in in Sochi territory.
Ball safe as Dinamo Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 58, Sebastian Szymanski of Dinamo Moscow smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Sochi's Timofey Margasov gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 59, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sochi.
Throw-in for Sochi at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Throw-in Sochi.
In the minute 61, Dinamo Moscow make their second substitution with Roman Neustadter replacing Ivan Ordets.
Nikolay Komlichenko is replacing Clinton N'Jie for Dinamo Moscow at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 63, Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Sochi in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Sochi close to the penalty box.
At Fisht Olympic Stadium, Roman Evgeniev has been booked for the second time in this match. An early shower is now waiting!
In the minute 65, Christian Noboa for Sochi drives towards goal at Fisht Olympic Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Sochi goal kick.
In the minute 67, Attention is being given to Sochi’s Soslan Dzhanaev and play has been suspended briefly.
Sochi’s Soslan Dzhanaev is on his feet again at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
In the minute 70, Dinamo Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Goal! Artur Yusupov extends Sochi's lead to 2-0.
Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in the half of Sochi.
In the minute 72, In Sochi Sochi drive forward through Anton Zabolotnyi. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Sochi have been awarded a corner by Vitaly Meshkov.
In Sochi, Ivan Novoseltsev (Sochi) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 74, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sochi.
Dinamo Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sylvester Igboun's header is off-target for Dinamo Moscow.
In the minute 76, Vitaly Meshkov awards Sochi a goal kick.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a Dinamo Moscow throw-in in Sochi's half.
Sochi have a goal kick.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Sochi at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Vladimir Fedotov is making the team's second substitution at Fisht Olympic Stadium with Kirill Zaika replacing Timofey Margasov.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in the half of Sochi.
In the minute 80, Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sochi's Ibrahim Tsallagov is on target but unsuccessful.
Can Sochi get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half?
In the minute 82, Goal kick for Sochi at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
The home team replace Joaozinho with Aleksandr Rudenko.
In the minute 83, Dinamo Moscow are in shooting range from this free kick.
The home team have replaced Christian Noboa with Danyl Prutsev. This is the fourth substitution made today by Vladimir Fedotov.
Dinamo Moscow drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In Sochi a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 86, Ball safe as Sochi is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow.
Vitaly Meshkov blows against Dinamo Moscow's Sylvester Igboun for offside.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 88, Sochi make their fifth substitution with Andrey Bokovoy replacing Artur Yusupov.
Goal kick for Dinamo Moscow at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in Sochi.
Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
At Fisht Olympic Stadium, Sochi are penalized for being offside.
Dinamo Moscow to take a throw-in in Sochi territory.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sochi.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-0.
